name: Pixel Pusher
description:
Pixel Pusher is a simple puzzle game in which you try to figure out how many colored boxes are on screen at a time.

There are currently three modes: Color Mode, Many Mode, and Near Mode. 

In Color Mode you guess how many of a specific color are on the screen. 

Many Mode is the easiest, in it you figure out which color has the most boxes on screen. 

And Near Mode is the hardest, it is like color mode but you also find colors close to the displayed color.  So if you're finding the boxes closest to blue, dark blue boxes count too!

Let me know if you have any feedback or run into any bugs! It wouldn't be difficult to add new modes if there is support and ideas for them. And if there are any game-breaking bugs found I'll do my best to fix them asap. 

And of course, ty for playing! <3
